abstract: Eljero George Rinaldo Elia (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈɛldʒəroː ˈeːlijaː]) (born 13 February 1987 in Voorburg) is a Dutch footballer who currently plays for Bundesliga club Werder Bremen. He scored on his debut for the Dutch national team in September 2009 and participated at the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa.

He scored on his debut for the Dutch national team in September 2009 and participated at the 2010 FIFA World Cup in South Africa.
